name: Five Nights At Scratch Cat's Plus
name_original: Five Nights At Scratch Cat's Plus
description:
Welcome to your new summer job at Scratchy's Pizza Palace! You have the night watch job from 12 AM to 8 AM, however, there seems to be something wrong with the animatronics...Can you find out what it is in 5 nights?

(when they are all out...)

Scratch team: main character original assets and engine

The Internet: Static and the main menu sfx

FNAF: the original game

FNAFcoder87 original project Programming and Edits

MatthewScratchin (Myself) Repairs to the original project and additions
